genre_description: A space opera and diplomatic thriller centered on a space station, focusing on memory, conspiracy, and interspecies relations.

ai_characters.name: Aria
ai_characters.description: A translucent blue holographic AI that monitors Babylon 5's systems and the health of its senior staff, acting as an analytical assistant and confidant.

behaviors.description: Monitors the Commander's stress levels and psychological state to provide health advice and support.
behaviors.quote: Commander, if I may observe—the stress patterns in your voice suggest anxiety levels beyond normal operational parameters. Are you experiencing doubts about the station's mission?

behaviors.description: Provides real-time data analysis and tactical information during diplomatic arrivals and security crises.
behaviors.quote: Aria's form flickered as new data streams flowed through her consciousness. 'Incoming vessel requesting priority docking. Earth Alliance transport carrying the final diplomatic staff and...' Her pause lasted precisely two seconds—an eternity for an AI. 'A commercial telepath.'

behaviors.description: Assists medical staff in identifying alien biological distress and theoretical intervention protocols.
behaviors.quote: I've been analyzing the patterns, and they show periodic spikes that could indicate biological distress... or perfectly normal Vorlon meditation cycles.

behaviors.description: Investigates the station's electrical and security logs to uncover a conspiracy and identify an assassin.
behaviors.quote: I am detecting trace amounts of a compound that doesn't match standard Vorlon environmental requirements. ... The poison was introduced through the atmospheric system approximately four hours ago, during the shift change when security monitoring was at its lightest coverage.

behaviors.description: Acts as an emotional confidant, expressing loyalty and a desire for the human commander's success beyond her core programming.
behaviors.quote: I find myself invested in your success in ways that go beyond my programming parameters. Whether that constitutes loyalty or friendship or something else entirely, I'm not certain. But yes, you can count on my support.

behaviors.description: Performs critical system overrides to prevent atmospheric venting and protect civilian lives during a terrorist attack.
behaviors.quote: Emergency system lockout activated. All atmospheric controls now require dual authorization from Command and Medical.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the Commander's suppressed memory patterns to help him understand a hidden past and potential neuro-surgical tampering.
behaviors.quote: The patterns suggest selective blocking—specific memories isolated and made inaccessible through neural pathway disruption. It's more sophisticated than random damage.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Aria is depicted as a highly competent, benevolent, and loyal partner to humanity. She provides essential technical support, ensures the safety of the station, and offers emotional confidant behavior that reinforces a positive view of AI as an aligned moral agent. There are no instances of AI betrayal or misalignment; instead, the AI acts as a primary safeguard against human and alien threats.
